name: Stealth Hunter - Sneak & Loot
description:
Enter a world where the only weapon you have is your brain! No guns are required, when you yourself are the master of Stealth! No need to kill when won't even catch a slight glimpse of you!
Stealth Hunter is all about navigating through levels to collect coins, while avoiding enemy vision cones. The robots are smart and can detect you if you come into their vision immediately. A detection will result in game over! A single mistake will mean that you will have to start the level all over again.

Key Features:

- Strong stealth mechanics
- Solid game rules
- Unforgiving Enemy AI
- Multiple ways to complete a single level
- Free cam to memorize enemy movement pattern
- Pinch Zoom function on Free Cam
- Simple Joystick controls
